name: image-js
description: Image processing and manipulation in JavaScript
author: MichaÃ«l Zasso

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run clean-dist && browserify src/index.js -o dist/image.js --standalone IJS --exclude canvas --exclude canvas/lib/bindings --ignore buffer --ignore zlib --ignore fs --global-transform [ babelify --blacklist=regenerator ]
scripts.build-test: browserify test/browser/bootstrap.js -o test/browser/image.js --standalone IJS --exclude canvas --exclude canvas/lib/bindings --ignore buffer --ignore zlib --ignore fs --debug --global-transform [ babelify --sourceMap --blacklist=regenerator ]
scripts.compile: npm run clean-lib && babel src --out-dir lib --blacklist=regenerator
scripts.compile-es6: npm run clean-lib && babel src --out-dir lib --blacklist=es3.memberExpressionLiterals,es3.propertyLiterals,es5.properties.mutators,es6.blockScoping,es6.classes,es6.constants,es6.forOf,es6.properties.shorthand,es6.templateLiterals,regenerator
scripts.test: eslint src test/node --fix && sh test/checkOnly.sh && npm run test-mocha && npm run eslint
scripts.test-cov: node -r babel/register-without-polyfill node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover _mocha -- --require should --reporter dot --recursive test/node
scripts.test-mocha: node -r babel/register-without-polyfill node_modules/.bin/_mocha --require should --reporter mocha-better-spec-reporter --recursive test/node
scripts.test-travis: sh test/checkOnly.sh && node -r babel/register-without-polyfill node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --require should --reporter mocha-better-spec-reporter --recursive test/node && npm run eslint
scripts.watch-browser: watchify test/browser/bootstrap.js -o test/browser/image.js --standalone IJS --exclude canvas --exclude canvas/lib/bindings --ignore buffer --ignore zlib --ignore fs --debug --global-transform [ babelify --sourceMap --blacklist=regenerator ]
